CLIENT_API_KEY.description: The API Key that the Client uses to send emails. This should be removed with SC-3387

CALENDAR_API_KEY.description: The API Key that the Calendar uses to resolve scopes. This should be removed with SC-3387

CONSENT_AGE_FIRST.description: First gate for consent. Starting at this age the user have to give his/her consent

CONSENT_AGE_SECOND.description: Second gate for consent. Starting at this age parent consent is not required

DISABLED_BRUTE_FORCE_CHECK.description: To disabled the brute force prevention hooks for by authentication.

SYNC_API_KEY.description: The API Key that the Sync and Mail Cron-Job uses to authenticate itself.This should be removed with SC-3387

TEACHER_VISIBILITY_FOR_EXTERNAL_TEAM_INV.description: defines wheter external team invitation shows teachers from different schools or not. if enabled system wide there are options general enabled or opt-in/-out by user required.

STUDENT_TEAM_CREATION.description: defines wheter students may create teams or not. if enabled system wide there are options general enabled or opt-in/-out by school admin required.

REDIS_URI.description: URL of a Redis server. If undefined, JWT whitelisting and timeouts will be disabled. Format: [redis[s]:]//[[user][:password@]][host][:port][/db-number][?db=db-number[&password=bar[&option=value]]]

PIN_MAX_AGE_SECONDS.description: Maximum time in seconds a generated pin is handled as valid.

JWT_LIFETIME.description: Lifetime of generated JWTs in days.

JWT_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.description: After this many seconds of inactivity, a user gets logged out automatically. If no REDIS_URI is set, this value is ignored.

FEATURE_JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_ENABLED.description: Using privateDevice parameter in login, the logout/jwt timeout can be extended to JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_SECONDS instead of JWT_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.

JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.description: After this many seconds (default is one month) of inactivity, a user gets logged out when accepted extended login duration. If no REDIS_URI is set, this value is ignored.

JWT_WHITELIST_ACCEPT_ALL.description: JWTs that are not in the whitelist are added to it, instead of invalidated. To be used for the first 2 hours after release.

TSP_API_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: The key used to encrypt/decrypt TSP request tokens.

TSP_API_SIGNATURE_KEY.description: The key used to sign/verify TSP request tokens.

BLOCK_DISPOSABLE_EMAIL_DOMAINS.description: Prevent use of disposable email addresses.

ADDITIONAL_BLACKLISTED_EMAIL_DOMAINS.description: Add custom domain to the list of blocked domains (comma separated list).

FEATURE_TSP_AUTO_CONSENT_ENABLED.description: Feature toggle for automatic consent during TSP sync.

FEATURE_VIDEOCONFERENCE_ENABLED.description: If enabled, adds video conferences to teams and courses.

VIDEOCONFERENCE_HOST.description: The BBB base url (should end without a slash).

VIDEOCONFERENCE_SALT.description: The BBB Salt for api call checksum creation.

FEATURE_MATRIX_MESSENGER_ENABLED.description: If enabled, adds support for Matrix Messenger.

MATRIX_URI.description: The URI of the Matrix Messenger server.

MATRIX_SERVERNAME.description: Servername of the Matrix Messenger server.

MATRIX_SECRET.description: Shared secret for the Matrix server.

FEATURE_RABBITMQ_ENABLED.description: If enabled, adds support to send RabbitMQ messages

RABBITMQ_URI.description: The URI of the RabbitMQ server.

RABBITMQ_MATRIX_CONSUME_CONCURRENCY.description: How many messages should be handled at the same time.

RABBITMQ_MATRIX_QUEUE_INTERNAL.description: Name of queue used to buffer building synchronization request internally.

RABBITMQ_MATRIX_QUEUE_EXTERNAL.description: Name of queue used to publish synchronization request.

HOST.description: The client url (should end without a slash).

FEATURE_ALERTS_STATUS_ENABLED.description: If enabled, user will see messages/incidents from e.g status.schul-cloud.

ALERT_STATUS_URL.description: The url of status message provider (should end without a slash).

ALERT_STATUS_API_URL.description: The api of status message provider (should end without a slash).

NEXBOARD_API_KEY.description: The nexboard api key for sending requests.

FEATURE_MULTIPLE_S3_PROVIDERS_ENABLED.description: Enables using the storage provider collection to determine a provider with free buckets upon school creation. If disabled, the only storage provider is configured via the environment variables in config/secrets.js

S3_KEY.description: Synchronous encryption key used to secure storage provider secrets. Only used with FEATURE_MULTIPLE_S3_PROVIDERS_ENABLED=true

ADMIN_TOGGLE_STUDENT_VISIBILITY.description: Allows school admin to toggle teacher's STUDENT_LIST permission.

LDAP_PASSWORD_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Synchronous encryption key used to secure search user passwords

SENTRY_DSN.description: Sentry DSN (uri), if defined, increase SENTRY_SAMPLE_RATE to desired value to get errors reported.

SENTRY_SAMPLE_RATE.description: This is the % count (0.00 to 1.00) of how many of the errors send to the backend. This filter go over all errors, maybe some lost by low user counts.

ETHERPAD_API_KEY.description: The etherpad api key for sending requests.

ETHERPAD_COOKIE__EXPIRES_SECONDS.description: Number of seconds after an etherpad cookie expires.

ETHERPAD_ETHERPAD_COOKIE_RELEASE_THRESHO.description: If Session Valid time is smaller than this, a new session is created on request.

SKIP_CONDITIONS_CONSENT.description: A string with concatenated user types (student, employee) that don't need to explicitly state their consent with the terms and conditions. "employee" means teachers and admins.

ACTIVATION_LINK_PERIOD_OF_VALIDITY_SECON.description: The time in seconds during which the activation link is valid. After expiration the entry is removed from the database

ADMIN_MAIL_RECEIVERS.description: A string that contains recievers of the daily stat and other mails. Can contain mutliple mails, seperated by comma

LERNSTORE_MODE.description: Defines the backend for the lernstore, the client just may be enabled or disabled only, if this is not disabled in the server.

ES_DOMAIN.description: The URL for the edu-sharing repository.

ES_USER.description: The username for edu-sharing api access

ES_PASSWORD.description: The password for edu-sharing api access

ES_GRANT_TYPE.description: The grant_type for edu-sharing api access

ES_OAUTH_SECRET.description: The oauth for edu-sharing api access

ES_CLIENT_ID.description: The client id for edu-sharing api access

ES_MERLIN_USERNAME.description: The username for Merlin login, used for edusharing

ES_MERLIN_PW.description: The password for Merlin login, used for edusharing

SILENT_ERROR_ENABLED.description: Brute force flag during recovery password process
